channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Project Silica rival plans to launch 500GB Proof-of-concept medium in 2026 — but questions remain about speed, durability, and cost
item.description: Optera develops 500GB glass-based optical storage using photoluminescence, building on earlier nanoparticle experiments, while technical and cost uncertainties persist.
